title: 我的世界最棒视频评比！官方正在举行的投票！
author: asc9966
txt_content:
本帖最后由 asc9966 于 2011-9-29 19:36 编辑 

Minecraft官方论坛正在举行一个关于最棒的视频的投票，地址是http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/620915-best-minecraft-video-giveaway/下面有10个预选视频，大家来看看吧。
Minecraft: The Last Minecart, by Telshin:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMjQ1MjYzNjQ0/v.swf
Bashcraft - The Legend of Hobo, by Bashuverse
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDY3Nzg0/v.swf
How to Close a Door With Style, by Salted:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDY5NzY4/v.swf
Minecraft Perfume (Lee Mack Parody), by conway265:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDc2MDA0/v.swf
Hogcraft: Hogwarts made in Minecraft, by Actionman1995:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDY4NDEy/v.swf
Minecraft Machinima, by kuzyn123:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDc2MDky/v.swf
"I Love Minecraft" Official Music Video, by Amsterdom:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDc0MjY4/v.swf
Minecraft Timelapse - Lakeside City, by iFirez:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDc3NDU2/v.swf
Song and Video "I Hate Creepers", by ZhadoTom:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMzAzNDgwMjA0/v.swf
Minecraft - Stop Motion Tetris, by JoBilly:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMjk5MTkyNjYw/v.swf
